turns.text: Okay Diane And very good afternoon to you

turns.text: Do you uh do most of your cooking at home or do you uh have lot of people come in and have to prepare for them
turns.label: qy

turns.text: Um no I do most of my cooking at home and um I could safely say that I have never cooked for dinner party

Of course um dinner parties down here probably oh turn out to be more things like barbecues And -

turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah uh Tex-Mex uh Mexican food um --

Well thats very interesting food though and when I go out to eat dinner sometimes --

turns.text: -- thats the type of foods I like to find
We have uh - I think som- Chicos - or or in these different restaurants --
-- in this area that uh have all this fine Mexican foods But um if I were to cook uh dinner party uh it may be standard to you but uh actually I never get too much fried chicken
But I would have fried chicken uh with reasonably hot sauce on it
turns.label: sd@

turns.text: Almost Mexican type thing And I love twice cooked potatoes Have you ever had twice cooked potatoes
With with cream made of the the sour cream and cream cheese and uh little oleo and I use uh oregano and --
-- maybe dill weed uh mixed in with it
And uh I like broccoli casseroles --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- which would include onion and cheese and and more dill weed --
-- and some medium hot peppers As you can see Im inclined towards the Mexican type of meal
And I would probably have some quiet and gentle fried onion rings mixed in there with it too
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So uh how would you improve upon that

turns.text: How do you cook your green beans
turns.label: qw

turns.text: Um I just get fresh green beans from the grocery store and snap off the ends and put them in water and steam them for about ten minutes
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And I like to put little Mrs Dash in with them
turns.label: sd

turns.text: All right thats what I was wondering about What what you use and and --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Right uh-huh Um I like to just put tablespoon or so of Mrs Dash in there
turns.label: b

turns.text: And it makes them pretty tasty
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Have you ever tried Chinese type green beans

But uh it does make nice thick creamy sauce with the green beans --

turns.text: -- and then you have nice soy sauce taste under it with few onions in there with it If it does -- -

Chinese cooking actually has lot of very delicious tastes to them

turns.text: And uh north African cooking is good --

And thats uh made from uh I think they call it beans And thats the type of something that whatever you mix with it this couscous uh absorbs the taste of whatever else you put in it where that makes very delicious dish You probably have to buy that from specialty stores

turns.text: And thats north African dish They eat it one to two meals everyday --
